d3d11.InputLayout¶

An input layout. See Layouts and input layouts.

Methods¶

class InputLayout¶
InputLayout(layoutdesc, effect, int techindex, int passindex) → InputLayout¶
Parameters:
  • layoutdesc – A layout description.
  • effect – A d3d11.Effect.
  • techindex – Effect’s technique index.
  • passindex – Effect’s technique’s pass index.

Creates a new InputLayout.
